title: Schema for norm-rules.json in build directory. Created by build-norm-rules Makefile target.

def_filename.description: Normative rule definition file that defines this rule

summary.description: Short summary of the normative rule (just a few words)

description.description: Complete description of the normative rule (sentence, paragraph, or longer)

kind.description: The kind of ISA object associated with this normative rule

instances.description: The names of ISA object instances of the specified kind associated with this normative rule

tags.description: List of normative rule tags that reference the ISA manuals

name.description: Name of the tag (an anchor in the ISA manual adoc files)

text.description: The text from the ISA manual associated with this tag (optional)

tag_filename.description: Tag file that contains maps tag names to tag text (optional)
